results.title: Longing for belonging
results.creator_credit: Jane Harrison, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jane Harrison’s search for belonging is a road trip with a lot of potholes along the way. Of mixed descent, she has longed to connect with her Indigenous heritage, which has forced her to confront some issues and attitudes within Australian society today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jane Harrison, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Jane Harrison’s search for belonging is a road trip with a lot of potholes along the way. Of mixed descent, she has longed to connect with her Indigenous heritage, which has forced her to confront some issues and attitudes within Australian society today.

results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2009)
results.brief_description: Seven members of the general public participate in ACMI’s Digital Storytelling program. Through the life changing events and tributes to family members, resonates a search for identity and a sense of home.

results.title: May's story
results.creator_credit: Sue Freeth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In 1895, at the age of 24, May sailed to Japan and dedicated her life to caring for the children in the villages. Sue Freeth, with the help of some of May’s ex-students, traces the path walked by May, and in doing so comes closer to understanding the life of this amazing woman.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sue Freeth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: In 1895, at the age of 24, May sailed to Japan and dedicated her life to caring for the children in the villages. Sue Freeth, with the help of some of May’s ex-students, traces the path walked by May, and in doing so comes closer to understanding the life of this amazing woman.

results.title: Experience the unknown
results.creator_credit: Valentina Zingg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Overwhelmed by choice, Valentina Zingg decides to journey to a land very different to Switzerland. While this hot, dry land helps her gain perspective, there is still something missing…
results.creator_credit_for_label: Valentina Zingg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Expand my boundaries
results.creator_credit: Denise VanWyk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When she was given the opportunity to study in Melbourne, Denise VanWyk and her family seized it with both hands. She marvels at her new home, its diversity, acceptance and relaxed atmosphere.

results.title: Art 4 Starts
results.creator_credit: Sonya Waters, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: What other people consider vandalism or graffiti, Sonya Waters sees as street art. Behind the work, Waters recognises the skill and social commentary inherent in the work and seeks to help the artists, often kids from disadvantaged backgrounds, recognise the artistic and social value of their work and become empowered by it.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sonya Waters, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: What other people consider vandalism or graffiti, Sonya Waters sees as street art. Behind the work, Waters recognises the skill and social commentary inherent in the work and seeks to help the artists, often kids from disadvantaged backgrounds, recognise the artistic and social value of their work and become empowered by it.
description_for_label: What other people consider vandalism or graffiti, Sonya Waters sees as street art. Behind the work, Waters recognises the skill and social commentary inherent in the work and seeks to help the artists, often kids from disadvantaged backgrounds, recognise the artistic and social value of their work and become empowered by it.

results.title: Weeding wars in peaceful places
results.creator_credit: Llywellyn Staiff, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Flora, fauna and bushland is what makes Maroondah and Australia different to anywhere else in the world. The agenda of Llywellyn and her colleagues is to protect what’s left.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Llywellyn Staiff, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Like mother...like daughter
results.creator_credit: Christine Lamb, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Christine Lamb is constantly told how much she’s like her mother. It is through looking back on her life and all the things her mother taught her, that Lamb learns how similar they really are.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Christine Lamb, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Christine Lamb is constantly told how much she’s like her mother. It is through looking back on her life and all the things her mother taught her, that Lamb learns how similar they really are.
